Take a class!

Ready to join the dozens of distinguished alumni as a student? Whether you’re an amateur trying something new or a professional wanting to take your career to the next level, our classes give you the opportunity to develop your skills in improv, acting, comedy writing, stand-up, and more. Sign up now by finding a class near you.

60 Years of Comedy

We bring the longest running improv stages, world’s largest training facilities, and a cast 100’s of alumni that have become household names!
